c971c121-85b9-44bf-a9bf-96e3df17c2db.name: Directional
c971c121-85b9-44bf-a9bf-96e3df17c2db.notes: @Direction: Back, Right, Left, Top or Underside@

814545ca-38bb-406b-a612-20a8a0f6fbe8.name: Tough Skin
814545ca-38bb-406b-a612-20a8a0f6fbe8.notes: Effects that just require skin contact or a scratch ignore this DR

b666c77a-9fb7-40ab-acce-48f81f94e5dd.name: Partial (@Location, 1 level per -1 Per Hit Modifier, Torso is -10% thus level 1@)

ed5c35f9-2723-4247-90b8-fbf7da158a56.name: Oxygen Storage
ed5c35f9-2723-4247-90b8-fbf7da158a56.notes: Can hold breath 25 times as long as normal

76d465d2-561c-4564-b77f-d82420dd26f5.name: Oxygen Storage
76d465d2-561c-4564-b77f-d82420dd26f5.notes: Can hold breath 50 times as long as normal

d8677b18-ef83-4a06-be4c-5397a0312d72.name: Oxygen Storage
d8677b18-ef83-4a06-be4c-5397a0312d72.notes: Can hold breath 100 times as long as normal

3c38dc72-202a-4825-9548-fe9d8dab8e66.name: Oxygen Storage
3c38dc72-202a-4825-9548-fe9d8dab8e66.notes: Can hold breath 200 times as long as normal

dcabaeb3-bda8-4cf6-83dd-6d426afa120e.name: Oxygen Storage
dcabaeb3-bda8-4cf6-83dd-6d426afa120e.notes: Can hold breath 300 times as long as normal

e0ed5566-9222-4ade-b5aa-e62e69440c8b.name: Diffuse
e0ed5566-9222-4ade-b5aa-e62e69440c8b.notes: Immune to crippling injuries. Brain, Vitals and Groin cannot be targeted. Most foes cannot slam or grapple you (GM's decision). Do not bleed. Unaffected by blood-borne toxins. Immune to attacks that rely on cutting off blood to part of your body. Impaling and piercing attacks of any size never do more than 1 HP of injury, regardless of penetrating damage. Other attacks never do more than 2 HP of injury. Exception: Area-effect, cone, and explosion attacks cause normal injury

71b6ed78-4158-48dd-ac5a-dc3c50aadd87.name: Homogenous
71b6ed78-4158-48dd-ac5a-dc3c50aadd87.notes: Altered wound modifiers: imp & pi++ are x1/2, pi+ is x1/3, pi is x1/5, pi- is x1/10

f5826c73-a368-400a-9aa3-2dbf25805334.name: No Blood
f5826c73-a368-400a-9aa3-2dbf25805334.notes: Do not bleed, unaffected by blood-borne toxins, immune to attacks that rely on cutting off blood to part of your body

9ae167e8-44c5-4bfd-aa81-7d3768b5eb48.name: No Brain
9ae167e8-44c5-4bfd-aa81-7d3768b5eb48.notes: Brain cannot be targeted. Blows to the skull or eye are treated like blows to the face, except that eye injury can still cripple the eye

5296cf36-2c91-4688-8621-3885f7428887.name: No Eyes
5296cf36-2c91-4688-8621-3885f7428887.notes: Eyes may not be targeted. Immune to blinding attacks

986ffcd5-d81a-4d8a-a92a-27bd28a8db67.name: No Head
986ffcd5-d81a-4d8a-a92a-27bd28a8db67.notes: Skull, Brain and Face cannot be targeted

2940d53b-ad25-4de0-9b6f-56954f743ddf.name: No Neck
2940d53b-ad25-4de0-9b6f-56954f743ddf.notes: Neck may not be targeted and cannot be decapitated, choked or strangled

83a284ba-cb56-4fd1-b1aa-f1f18e9af0d9.name: No Vitals
83a284ba-cb56-4fd1-b1aa-f1f18e9af0d9.notes: Attacks to the Vitals or Groin are treated as attacks to the Torso

aeb98d25-7d6a-4468-a364-1a950d79d96b.name: Unliving
aeb98d25-7d6a-4468-a364-1a950d79d96b.notes: Altered wound modifiers: imp & pi++ are x1, pi+ is x1/2, pi is x1/3, pi- is x1/5
